cause.description:
This project will make women’s football a catalyst for unity and reconciliation while creating a viable economic activity, thereby reducing poverty amongst women.
Genocide left women survivors traumatized and with no more value for life. In 1997, we ladies decided to rub off history and took initiative to encourage women football for unity & reconciliation - Rwemalika Felicite, Founder, AKWOF
1. Sport can be a catalyst for social change.
2. Sport can promote girls' and women's rights.
3. Sport can be a forum for reconciliation.
cause.mission: Promote girls and women’s rights and self-confidence through sport.
cause.name: Football for Unity in Rwanda
